resources.string: Enter Customer Name for Phone Bill

This is an app to manage phone bills for customers. Phone bills can contain multiple phone calls. Following are the supported features: 

1. Add Customer Phone Bill 
2. Add Phone Calls to Customer Phone Bill 
3. Search for all Phone Calls in a Phone Bill 
4. Search for Phone Calls between two times in a Phone Bill 

This app has been written by Karan Patel.
